project_descr: This project will enhance the Niue’s capacities to effectively create and manage its protected areas, focusing on the expansion of its Protected Areas estate on land and on its marine areas. (PPG)

outputs.output_descr: This is the preparatory phase of the full-size project of Ridge to Reef in Niue. (Estimate Budget is US$4,194,862)

document_name: PPG - R2R Application of Ridge to Reef Concept for Biodiversity Conservation, and for the Enhancement of Ecosystem Service and Cultural Heritage
